## Browser.process() method

The spawned browser process. Returns `null` if the browser instance was created with [Puppeteer.connect()](./puppeteer.puppeteer.connect.md).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
process(): ChildProcess | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

ChildProcess \| null
